CS.CLICK_TO_SCENE.LibWrapperError: Click-to-Scene requires 'libWrapper'. Please install & enable it.
CS.CLICK_TO_SCENE.MonksNavigationActive: Monk’s Scene Navigation is detected and active in this world. Click‑to‑Scene’s scenes list click behavior in sidebar has been disabled by default. You can still use journal links, and Click‑to‑Scene remains fully functional there.

EnableScenesList.Name: Quick Navigation in Sidebar
EnableScenesList.Hint: Allows jumping to scenes by clicking on a scene on scenes tab in sidebar.
